attributes.title: Worst app
attributes.review: This app is absolutely the worst. I’ve waited over two weeks and still won’t download. I don’t recommend this app. Plus idk why I wanted to see an orange when I could just go look in my fridge🤡. But work on your trashy app🙄.

attributes.title: AWFUL APPLICATION
attributes.review: Took 1 year to download. As I searched the app my phone started over heating and exploded!! It caused the whole state of California to erupt.😾😾 I was forced to buy a new one and now the trump administration/ creators of this app owes me about $1,000 and somewhere to live. No one should ever get this app.😽😽

attributes.title: Disappointed
attributes.review: I was really looking forward to it but it keeps on glitching and everytime I go to open the app somehow my phone shuts down and when I go get in it just freezes up every time🤦🏻‍♀️NEED FIXING!!!

attributes.title: No I just can’t
attributes.review: I’m so but I have to give it a one star I now need therapy for the trauma this app has caused me to have. There was a Cheeto rapist on the first screen and it scared me so bad I need therapy for a couple months IF EVERYTHING GOES WELL! And just so we are clear I’m not really sorry

attributes.title: Horrible app, terrible on both sides
attributes.review: China probably has better apps. HUGE disappointment. This app is more of a virus on our phones than the rona is on our planet. I was hoping to pour myself a cup of covfefe and enjoy an app but of course I was totally prepared to delete the app.

attributes.title: He is an awful person
attributes.review: Trump is racist, homophobic, a rapist and he was also impeached so let’s not forget that. If you support this horrible man than you are blind to his horrible actions and if you support him you are also racist and homophobic no matter what party you are in.

attributes.title: ✨no✨
attributes.review: This is terrible the app when I opened it I new it was trash and don't get me started how many wife's your had the only reason you have that one is cause you have the money and your Priedent sooo if you take TikTok down your app is to byeeeeee orange Cheeto

attributes.title: Kept crashing my phone
attributes.review: Every time I opened the app it kept making my phone really hot and then it’d go black screened and exit the app!!! TOTAL GARBAGE! You’d think the potus would have his own app settled but I guess not ://// I hate it. It should be taken down!!

attributes.title: Crashes
attributes.review: A lot of these reviews seem fake and I’m not sure why, but I have genuine issues with the app. It always crashes right after I try to open it, they need to do some serious re-programming!

Ummmm... tell me why I opened the app and it started playing Yo Gabba Gabba. It’s not even in English! This had me out raged. Also when I typed in my phone number it kept sending my Piggly Wiggly coupons that were EXPIRED btw. Unacceptable. Chile anyways would not recommend this app AT ALL.
